title: Getting ahold of riot..
body: Hey,  so I finished reading through the terms of use. And I read something about another way of getting a hold of Riot? a yordle call center.! And i'd like to know when I can expect this to be live {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

replies.body:
The Yordle call center went ablaze at our first attempt.  Too much salt resulted in yordle mega transformations of destruction.  Some would take a break and disappear into the bushes never to return.  One ended up turning a player into a turnip that tasted purple.  

Yordles are angry!  So now you get us cute poros instead.  We're less focused on destruction and more on players.  Oh and we're adorable too!  ^___^  

Welcome to the Poro Snax Center.  Please drop noms here for service.  <3
{{summoner:31}}
This is literally why I will always play this game. {{item:2052}} {{item:2052}}
